hint: Apply aggressive early filtering to dimension tables (especially date_dim with complex OR conditions) before joins, and push outer filters into CTEs to reduce intermediate result sizes.
Isolate all dimension table filtering into separate CTEs before joining with fact tables, and materialize shared dimension patterns to avoid repeated computation across the query.

Pre-join filtered dimensions with fact tables early, then perform window operations on pre-aggregated results. Restructure the self-join in v2 using window functions (LAG/LEAD) instead of explicit joins.
Transform the OR conditions on date_dim into UNION ALL branches for better predicate pushdown, and explore restructuring the self-join pattern using EXISTS logic or splitting the CTE by date ranges.
